_header: Go little bill and commend me hertely [Go litull bill and command me hertely]
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 474.
_description: Humfrey Newton, An epistle to his mistress — eleven couplets

BodLatMisC66.First Lines:
Go litull bill & command me hertelyvnto her þat I call my
                    trulof & lady…
BodLatMisC66.Last Lines: …be alle the tokens trulycomand me to her hertely
